item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“0 W N 3 D, post:1, topic:242000”]how can i change drops in reapage scape source… only thing tht’s inside npcdrops.java file is : [code]public class NPCDrops {
public int npcId;
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
    npcId = _npcId;
    for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
        Items[i] = -1;
        ItemsN[i] = 0;
    }
}

}[/code] i wana change green,blue,red and black dragon drops…[/quote]

stay of that file , look at npcdrops.cfg , you need to change it there

supra ~

Read full topic

how can i change drops in reapage scape source… only thing tht’s inside npcdrops.java file is : [code]public class NPCDrops {

    for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
